name: COVID-2019 - Hospital & ICU (ECDC)
title: COVID-2019 - Hospital & ICU (ECDC)
description: Raw data on hospitalization and Intensive Care Unit (ICU) admission rates and current occupancy for COVID-19 is sourced from the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC). Our complete COVID-19 dataset is a collection of the COVID-19 data maintained by Our World in Data. It is updated daily and includes data on confirmed cases, deaths, and testing. We have created a new description of all our data sources. You find it at our GitHub repository here. There you can download all of our data.

sources.name: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)
sources.additionalInfo: Raw data on hospitalization and Intensive Care Unit (ICU) admission rates and current occupancy for COVID-19 is sourced from the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC). Our complete COVID-19 dataset is a collection of the COVID-19 data maintained by Our World in Data. It is updated daily and includes data on confirmed cases, deaths, and testing. We have created a new description of all our data sources. You find it at our GitHub repository here. There you can download all of our data.
sources.dataPublishedBy: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)

fields.name: Daily ICU occupancy
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Current number of COVID-19 patients in ICU", "unit": "patients in ICU", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Daily ICU occupancy per million
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of COVID-19 patients in ICU per million", "unit": "per million", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 2}

fields.name: Daily hospital occupancy
fields.description: Daily hospital occupancy is the number of COVID-19 patients in hospital on a given day.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of COVID-19 patients in hospital", "unit": "patients", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.description: Daily hospital occupancy is the number of COVID-19 patients in hospital on a given day.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of COVID-19 patients in hospital per million", "unit": "per million", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 2}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Weekly new ICU admissions for COVID-19", "unit": "ICU patients", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Weekly new ICU admissions for COVID-19 per million", "unit": "per million", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 2}
